wikipedia_page.main: Niamh Rippin (born 30 March 1994) is a British former artistic gymnast and was a reserve athlete for the 2012 Summer Olympics team.

response: *(Born 1994) Niamh Rippin, gymnast, London 2012 reserve, was born in Nottingham.

In March, Fellows competed at the British Championships, this was her first year as a senior. She won the silver medal in the all-around competition with a final score of  54.900. she scored 14.050 on the vault, 13.350 on the uneven bars, 13.300 on the balance beam and 14.200 on the floor exercise.http://www.british-gymnastics.org/results/7198/Results_Allaround_-_WAG_Senior.pdf In the uneven bars final, Fellows tied for 5th place with Niamh Rippin with a score of 13.150,http://www.british-gymnastics.org/results/7198/Results_-_WAG_Senior_Apparatus_Finals_Uneven_Bars.pdf she also placed 6th in the balance beam final with a score of 11.600http://www.british-gymnastics.org/results/7198/Results_-_WAG_Senior_Apparatus_Finals_Beam.pdf and in the floor exercise final she placed 4th with a score of 13.950.http://www.british-gymnastics.org/results/7198/Results_-_WAG_Senior_Apparatus_Finals_Floor.pdf
